content: I was thinking of getting my mom's old diamond ring appraised because I've been wanting to know its value. I've had it in my jewelry box, which I finally organized on February 7th, by the way. It looks so much better now, and it's easier to find what I'm looking for. Anyway, back to the ring - I've been curious about its history and value, so I think getting it appraised is a good idea. Do you think I should also consider getting it insured?
